title: Love, Sacrifice and Quality: A Talk on Knowing with Sevilla King about Robert Pirsig and Esther Meek
description: Is the Quality Event the same thing as the gift of grace that offers knowledge and insight? Taking a look at the ideas of Pirsig and Meek, side by side, to see if there is a difference between quality and love.
